author: BRUHAN MAKONG
title: President Ruto appoints Lt. Charles Muriu Vice Chief of Defence Forces in new military changes
text: NAIROBI, Kenya, Mar 8 – President William Ruto has promoted Major General Charles Muriu Kahariri to the rank of Lieutenant General and appointed him the Vice Chief of Defence Forces. He succeeds Lieutenant General Jonah Maina, whose term has ended after 42 years in service. The new military changes effected Friday are in line with Section 9(2)(a) of the Kenya Defence Forces Act. Additionally, Major General David Kimaiyo Tarus has been promoted to Lieutenant General and appointed as the new Commander of the Kenya Army, taking over from Lieutenant General Peter Mbogo Njiru, who served for 39 years. Prior to this, Lieutenant General Tarus served as the Deputy Army Commander. President Ruto has also elevated Major General Jimson Longiro to the rank of Lieutenant General and designated him as the Vice Chancellor of the National Defence University – Kenya. Major General Longiro previously held the position of Commander of the Kenya Navy. Brigadier Thomas Nioroge Ng’ang’a has been promoted to Major General and named as the new Commander of the Kenya Navy. He succeeds Brigadier Thomas Nioroge Ng’ang’a, who was previously the Base Commander at Kenya Navy Base Manda. These decisions were made following recommendations from the Defence Council, chaired by Defence Cabinet Secretary Aden Bare Duale. Additionally, Major General Juma Shee Mwinyikai has been promoted to Lieutenant General and appointed as the Commandant of the National Defence College, while Major General Mohamed Nur Hassan has been assigned to Headquarters Kenya Army as the Deputy Army Commander. In further changes, Brigadier Luka Kipkemoi Kutto has been promoted to Major General and appointed as the General Officer Commanding Eastern Command. Major General Alphaxard Muthuri Kiugu, former commander of the East Africa Community Response Force (EACRF) in the DRC, has been posted to the Kenya Military Academy as Commandant. Other notable changes include Major General John Maison Nkoimo, who has been posted to Border Security Command as the General Officer Commanding, and Brigadier Peter Shikuku Chelimno, who has been appointed Deputy Navy Commander at Headquarters Kenya Navy. Brigadier Yahya Abdi has been posted to the National Defence College and designated as Senior Directing Staff Navy. KDF said that other changes have been made across the military in line with the advice of the Defence Council.

author: CNN Newsource
title: Ola de incendios en Monterrey causa contingencia ambiental hasta nuevo aviso
text:
CNN en Español
La Secretaría de Medio Ambiente de Nuevo León (norte de México) declaró este miércoles contingencia ambiental hasta nuevo aviso en la zona metropolitana de Monterrey, debido a la mala calidad del aire causada en parte por una reciente ola de más de 239 incendios forestales y en terrenos baldíos que se registraron este martes.
La institución agregó en un comunicado que se recomienda evitar las actividades al aire libre, pues las autoridades han detectado altas concentraciones de partículas menores a 10 micrómetros (PM10).
Según la Organización Mundial de la Salud (OMS), las partículas PM10 pueden provocar problemas cardiovasculares, cerebrovasculares, y la exposición por un lapso prolongado está vinculada al cáncer de pulmón .
The-CNN-Wire
™ & © 2025 Cable News Network, Inc., a Warner Bros. Discovery Company. All rights reserved.

author: Amanda Lynne
title: Julianne Hough Sways Hips in Hot Pink Leggings for Spirited Workout | The Nerd Stash
text: [Julianne Hough](https://thenerdstash.com/tag/julianne-hough) is starting 2024 on a health kick. The [Dancing With The Stars co-host ](https://thenerdstash.com/former-dwts-pro-julianne-hough-talks-wellness-in-her-birthday-suit/)looked incredible as she showed off one of her workout sessions in a skimpy pink legging outfit that showcased her dancer’s body perfectly. Hough partnered with Blender Bites and hit up their [Instagram ](https://www.instagram.com/p/C1sOPiuMxw8/?hl=en)account to share a video of herself riding an exercise bike in a spirited fashion as she worked her toned muscles. In the video, Hough is rocking a hot pink sports bra that fits tightly around her tiny torso and spotlights her toned arms and shoulders. Meanwhile, she added a pair of matching high-waisted leggings. The workout pants clung tightly to her toned legs as she bounced up and down while riding the stationary bike. The actress put a little flair into her workout by swaying her hips and adding a dancing element to the routine. Julianne Hough Shows off Her Sexy Workout Routine Julianne Hough accessorized her workout look with a gold necklace and matching bracelet. She also wore a pair of bright white sneakers. She had her sandy blonde hair parted down the middle. The locks were styled in loose waves that poured over her shoulders and down her back as she moved her body rhythmically. Of course, fans didn’t hesitate to share their thoughts on Hough’s steamy workout video. “My whole queen,” one person commented. Another fan posted a flame, heart eyes, and shocked face emoji to show their reaction to the clip. It appears that the dancer has big plans for the upcoming year. She recently shared her intentions to her own Instagram account, disclosing that she’s ready for big moments as she lives in gratitude, per [The Sun.](https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/10020453/julianne-hough-exercises-leggings-bra-after-dwts/) Meanwhile, Julianne Hough continues to inspire her fans regarding [ her fitness and wellness routines](https://thenerdstash.com/former-dwts-pro-julianne-hough-talks-wellness-in-her-birthday-suit/), as well as her fashion choices. So, taking her advice when it comes to exercise is something that her followers are likely to do.

author: Nebuchanezzar
title: #33 Un atentado islamista durante la misa de Navidad deja más de 160 cristianos asesinados en Nigeria
text:
[Expat_Guinea_Ecuatorial](/user/Expat_Guinea_Ecuatorial)a [gaceta.es](/go/link/3891432) [#0](c0#c-0) Ese titular es tendencioso y confuso, y probablemente seas consciente. El ataque no fue durante una misa, como quiere dar a entender, si no que se atacó una serie de aldeas de manera coordinada. Y además, el factor religioso no es el único relevante, y tampoco está plenamente confirmado.

La reciente matanza sucedida en Navidad confirma lo que anuncian las estadísticas: el cristianismo es la religión más perseguida en el mundo. Y no se limita solamente a esta región de África, sino que ocurre en Asia y Medio Oriente. Hace poco a cristianos perseguidos por el régimen comunista chino se les negó asilo en la España de Pedro Sánchez y el PSOE. Solo una lo pudo obtener porque su salud le impedía subir al avión donde la deportaban.
Todo ello, mientras las pateras siguen llegando a España, posiblemente con insurgentes tan radicales como los que masacran a los cristianos en Nigeria y sin el amparo para los cristianos que huyen de estos.

Y la revolución hostigada por el tío Sam puso a los integristas islámicos. Los valerosos muyahidines, como dijeron en Rambo 3, que les dedicaron.

yo no financie a nadie, manipulador de pacotilla. Típico de esos de la bandera de tu perfil.

¿O por "no quiero saber"? Te dan la oportunidad de aprender, no la desperdicies.

Entre tu y yo? Es duro entrar aquí a un noticia tan trágica y ponerte a discutir sobre si la culpa es o no es de occidente o ya estás curado de eso?
Entras aquí a recalcar que "no quiero saber" tu verdad... Que ascazo.
[#21](c21#c-21) Eres tú quien ha introducido este tema. Igual esperabas otro tipo de respuestas y ahora te arrepientes de haberte puesto a chapotear con intención de salpicar a los demás.
[#23](c23#c-23) en todo momento denunció:
1* las atrocidades de grupos islamistas radicales, no como tantos aquí que aprendieron que eran los talibanes hace 2 meses y ahora los llaman partisanos. Asesinos es su nombre, como es el del gobierno de irán o Arabia Saudita ente otros.
2* crítico a los que claramente ocultan y defienden a estos asesinos bajo un pretexto de victimismo en Palestina.
Un terrorista es un terrorista y lo es con 0 muertos en Palestina y con un millón de muertos.
[#27](c27#c-27) 1a parte todo bien. Segunda, ya no tanto ¿Cómo que terrorista se es y punto?
¿Crees de verdad que si a esta gente nadie estuviera tocándole los huevos en su casa harían lo mismo?
Ir a la raíz del problema, a las causas, e intentar desenredar un tema complejo no es defender a nadie.
Estos son los que en Francia, España e Italia eran llamados partisanos por que no se que mierdas de las circunstancias? O estos los podemos llamar terroristas?
La yihad se lleva a cabo con muerte de infieles y el miedo a serlo.
No se trata de liberar nada, cada ataque sirve para atraer radicales y causar estragos en los no creyetes.
Quien apoya a yihadistas es tan asesino como ellos.
[#3](c3#c-3) Estos son los que llevan EEUU y UK financiando más de un siglo
A lo más fundamentalista y extremista
Aquí cuando iban a la casa blanca a recibir paguitas
https://es.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Archivo:Reagan_sitting_with_people_from_the_Afghanistan-Pakistan_region_in_February_1983.jpg
[#8](c8#c-8) bajo ninguna circunstancia son culpables de sus actos, siempre es otro, la culpa siempre será de EEUU, de UK, de la sociedad, de la Bernarda, pero nunca ellos y su fanatismo religioso serán los culpables para vosotros.

Es decir para vosotros el fanatismo islámico viene de un supuesto apoyo de EEUU a hamas y no de irán...

A quien coño quieres dar lecciones?

Tu: apoyas yihadistas para quitarte de en medio un enemigo común.
Eso que tienes ahí llamando nazis es la bandera de Israel no? Imagino que no eres simpatizante, pues eso.
La única deferencia entre EEUU y vosotros es que a EEUU sólo le movía la política, a vosotros os pierde el fanatismo.
Sabes lo que más me revienta de vosotros? Que no vais a ser vosotros quien caiga en esa oscuridad por vuestra culpa.
Habrá niños de 15 que se sentirán libertadores, partisanos, defensores poniendo bombas para un estado islámico por vuestra culpa y vuestros comentarios.

author: Cam Jandrow
title: Parts of Massachusetts seeing COVID-19 case rise
text:
WORCESTER, Mass. - Dr. Michael Hirsh says COVID-19 isn't going away anytime soon. In fact, as the virus continues to mutate, Hirsh says it looks to be a permanent fixture like the flu.
"Their mission is to spread widely, but not necessarily make us so sick," Hirsh said.
One such variant is leaving patients with itchy eyes and throats, similar to the symptoms of allergies.
"This is a very clever mutation because so many people will write it off and they'll just go on with their lives, going on airplanes, going into stadiums," said Hirsh.
What You Need To Know UMass Memorial Health says the number of COVID cases are three times what they were in June
Infectious disease expert Dr. Richard Ellison says it appears the peak of cases is behind us, having topped out at the start of August
Worcester's medical director, Dr. Michael Hirsh, says one variant has given patients similar symptoms to allergies, like itchy eyes and scratchy throat
Both Hirsh and Ellison recommend vaccination heading into the fall and winter seasons At UMass Memorial Medical Center, they're feeling the impact of that clever mutation. Infectious disease expert Dr. Richard Ellison says COVID-19 numbers are now three times what they were in June. He says most patients now are experiencing very mild symptoms, but the concern now is what it could mean for healthcare workers.
"If we have five or six or seven people in the radiation therapy department or in our stroke unit where we also have very specialized staff, suddenly having those people out of the hospital for four or five days really impacts the hospital's services," Ellison said.
Earlier this month, the hospital asked all staff to start wearing masks again.
Ellison and Hirsh believe the worst has passed, saying cases peaked at the start of August and are on the downswing. Both would emphasize vaccination in the fight against severe illness. But it's something which hasn't gone over well locally.
"The vaccine that was offered back last September only had about 18% to 20% compliance," Hirsh said.
Ahead of the fall and winter seasons, times of year COVID-19 has its more severe surges, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is recommending the updated COVID-19 and flu shots for everyone ages six months or older.
"This recommendation was based on extensive data and clinical trials," said CDC Director Mandy Cohen while speaking on the vaccine. "As a doctor, a mom, a wife, a daughter, and head of the CDC, I would not recommend anything to others that I would not recommend for my own family."
To avoid further spread, Hirsh says to follow the same steps you were during the pandemic.
"It sounds like a broken record. But, yes, I think hand washing is very important," Hirsh said. "I think staying home if you're sick, either from work or from school [is] very important."
